Headline: Temporary Westbound #87 87th Reroute near 87th Street/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted near 87th Street/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via  87th, Cottage Grove, 90th, King Drive, 87th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 87th Street/St. Lawrence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at #36 Broadway
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Foster, Broadway, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
